entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
